title: -QN notification flag not working
description: The -QN/--notify flag doesn't enable ntfy notifications. Need to trace the flag through ralph.zsh -> ralph-ui to find where it's being lost.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Trace -QN flag from ralph.zsh through to ralph-ui runner
Verify RALPH_NOTIFY env var is set when -QN passed
Verify ralph-ui reads --notify flag and enables notifications
Fix the broken link in the notification chain
Test: `ralph 5 -QN` should send ntfy notification on iteration complete
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: BUG-002 restore -QN notification flag functionality
